# ChatEntry

The `ChatEntry` component holds and displays one chat message.

## Import

```typescript
import { ChatEntry } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<Chat>
  <ChatEntry />
</Chat>
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" variables={exampleCount: 1} /%}

## Properties

{% parameter name="entry" type="ReceivedChatMessage" optional=false %}
The chat massage object to display.

{% /parameter %}

{% parameter name="hideName" type="boolean" optional=true %}
_(Optional)_ Hide sender name. Useful when displaying multiple consecutive chat messages from the same person.

{% /parameter %}

{% parameter name="hideTimestamp" type="boolean" optional=true %}
_(Optional)_ Hide message timestamp.

{% /parameter %}

{% parameter name="messageFormatter" type="MessageFormatter" optional=true %}
_(Optional)_ An optional formatter for the message body.

{% /parameter %}
